p: While the vector competence of Ae. albopictus for the five viruses considered in this study has been largely examined, European native mosquitoes ( Anopheles, Culiseta, Coquillettidia, Uranotaenia) were poorly investigated. The role of ornithophilic species, such as Cs. morsitans, and opportunistic species (mosquitoes that feed on mammalians as well as on birds or amphibians) like An. plumbeus or Ae. geniculatus, is still unknown, especially in the transmission of USUV and WNV. An. plumbeus, however, was tested competent for WNV, and Ae. geniculatus for CHIKV and WNV [ 35, 36].
